CustomField.formula: IF(Parent_Booking__r.Monday__c, "Mon ","") + IF(Parent_Booking__r.Tuesday__c, "Tue ","") + IF(Parent_Booking__r.Wednesday__c, "Wed ","") + IF(Parent_Booking__r.Thursday__c, "Thu ","") + IF(Parent_Booking__r.Friday__c, "Fri ","") + IF(Parent_Booking__r.Saturday__c, "Sat ","") + IF(Parent_Booking__r.Sunday__c, "Sun ","")
CustomField.label: Parent Requested Days
